revised_title: Election of Fellows and Their Distinguished Contributions in 1979
tldr: The article highlights the election of distinguished fellows in various scientific disciplines in 1979, including their significant contributions to fields such as geology, physics, chemistry, biology, mathematics, engineering, environmental sciences, medicine, ecology, paleontology, astrophysics, and microbiology.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science and Scientific Biography
